DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate intravaginal culture use medical device INVOcell generate day 5 blastocyst comparison traditional IVF .
DOC.brief_title: Vaginal Culture Using INVOcell Compared Traditional IVF Incubation
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase III , single center , open label randomize comparative trial evaluate intravaginal culture use INVOcell vs. traditional IVF generate day 5 embryo Pilot : 40 couple ( 80 patient ) , randomize receive either intravaginal culture ( n=20 ) use INVOcell traditional IVF ( n=20 ) Primary Endpoints : Blastocyst generation rate : number day 5 embryo `` good quality '' define 2BB great ( expansion embryo 2,3,4,5 6 inner cell mass outer cell mass grade A B ) high use Gardner Grading System divide number egg incubate Patient acceptability INVOcell intravaginal culture . Secondary Endpoints : Live birth rate : number cycle live birth divide number cycle embryo transfer . Clinical pregnancy rate : number cycle fetal heartbeat week 7 divide number cycle embryo transfer . Fertilization rate : Number embryo obtain incubation divide number oocyte place device . Embryo transfer rate : Number cycle initiate divided number cycle embryo transfer Miscarriage rate : Number miscarriage divide number cycle embryo transfer Multiple rate : Number cycle twin triplet divide number cycle embryo transfer Miscarriage rate per clinical pregnancy : Number miscarriage divide number cycle clinical pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Couples participate study pre select follow major indication : Women diagnose : Tubal factor Endometriosis ( type I II ) Ovulatory dysfunction ( slight ) Multiple female factor ( < 2 ) Males slight male factor Couples : Unknown factor Multiple factor , female male origin ( < 2 ) Other rare factor exclude inclusion/exclusion criterion ( e.g . cervical mucus immune factor treatable IUI ) The preselected couple include study fulfill specific inclusion exclusion criterion . Couples may include study inform study give write consent . Infertile couple failure conceive recognize pregnancy one year ( 12 menstrual cycle ) unprotected intercourse IVF determine physician next treatment Women include study : Be age 18 38 ( 38th birthday time enrollment ) . Have normal gynecological examination Pap smear last 12 month . Have normal follicle stimulate hormone ( < 10 mIU/mL ) E2 ( < 250 pmol/L ) Day 3 , determine past 12 month Have antimullerian hormone > 1 < 3 ng/mL Have normal baseline pelvic ultrasound examination past 12 month Have normal uterine cavity assess past year hysterosalpingogram , sonohysterography hysteroscopy . Prior tubal ligation acceptable . Have negative cervical test G.C Chlamydia past 12 month . Have male partner normal semen analysis total number > 15 million total motile spermatozoon normal morphology borderline normal morphology ( > 3 % strict criterion ) progression rating > 2 . Women exclude study : Inability read speak English fluently A history recurrent vaginitis A history toxic shock syndrome Known allergy plastic , human serum protein gentamicin Had pelvic surgery within past 8 week , exclude diagnostic laparoscopy Pelvic inflammatory disease ( PID ) within past 3 month treat antibiotic Severe endometriosis ( stage IIIIV ) endometriomas ( past present ) Clinical sign vaginal infection Significant abnormalities vaginal cavity Sub mucus intramural fibroid ( > 1 cm diameter ) Hydrosalpinx Chronic illness , e.g . autoimmune disease , diabetes BMI > 36 Donor oocyte , donor sperm antral follicle count < 6 > 20 AntiMullerian Hormone < 1 > 3 Previously respond poorly ovarian stimulation polycystic ovary patient High responder ovarian stimulation Cervical stenosis , demonstrate failed mock embryo transfer Can tolerate speculum examination Unwilling unable wear retention system ( diaphragm ) 5 day incubation . ➢ 2 previously fail IVF ( neg βhCG ) Previously fail fertilization oocyte previous IVF cycle Smoke abuse drug alcohol Poor understanding procedure Partner vasectomy reversal Partner difficulty produce sperm specimen Partner urogenital infection . Sperm culture perform partner show show symptom urogenital infection .
